mapper.insert: insert into history (historyUserId, historyArticleId, historyDate) values (#{userId}, #{articleId}, NOW()) on duplicate key update historyDate = NOW()
mapper.select: select historyArticleId as id, title, user_author.name as authorName, user_author.icon as authorIcon, user_author.id as authorId from article join history join user join user as user_author on article.id = history.historyArticleId and user.id = history.historyUserId and article.articleUserId = user_author.id where user.id = #{id} order by historyDate desc
